alternativeNames:
Au grand air
Beztroski kemping
Laid-Back Camp
Yuru Camp
Yurukyan
ゆるキャン△
author: Afro
description: Rin, a girl camping by herself at the base of Mt. Fuji. Nadeshiko, a girl who came to see Mt. Fuji on her bicycle. The scenery the two witness over a supper of cup ramen marks the start of a new friendship and many adventures to come, camping in the great outdoors!
